channel.title: vim on More Muc Than You Can Handle
channel.description: Recent content in vim on More Muc Than You Can Handle

item.title: Valuable Links - Vim
item.description: First Off - Introducing Valuable Links Today I’ve decided to start something new. I tend to send my friends and colleagues links about all sorts of things. Usually when they are pertinent to a problem they are having, or to supplement a conversation I’ve had with them. My usual process to reproduce these links ends up being a search in: Twitter, Pocket, History, and my Bookmarks. Also, when I share my links I tend to write a few sentences about them.
